mapper.sql: SELECT h.h_id, h.h_seller_id, h.h_name, h.h_describe, h.h_address, h.h_detail_address, h.h_price, h.h_longitude, h.h_latitude, h.h_square, h.h_checked, s.s_name, s.s_phone, s.s_email, (h.h_price * h.h_square) as total_price FROM house h LEFT JOIN seller s ON h.h_seller_id = s.s_id LEFT JOIN house_tag ht ON h.h_id = ht.ht_house_id LEFT JOIN tag t ON ht.ht_tag_id = t.t_id
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT h.h_id) FROM house h LEFT JOIN seller s ON h.h_seller_id = s.s_id LEFT JOIN house_tag ht ON h.h_id = ht.ht_house_id LEFT JOIN tag t ON ht.ht_tag_id = t.t_id
SELECT t.t_name FROM house_tag ht JOIN tag t ON ht.ht_tag_id = t.t_id WHERE ht.ht_house_id = #{houseId} ORDER BY t.t_id
SELECT hp_picture_path FROM house_picture WHERE hp_house_id = #{houseId} ORDER BY hp_picture_number

SELECT DISTINCT h.*, s.s_name, s.s_phone, s.s_email FROM house h JOIN seller s ON h.h_seller_id = s.s_id JOIN house_tag ht ON h.h_id = ht.ht_house_id JOIN tag t ON ht.ht_tag_id = t.t_id WHERE t.t_type = #{tagType} AND h.h_checked = 1 ORDER BY h.h_id DESC

SELECT DISTINCT h.*, s.s_name, s.s_phone, s.s_email FROM house h JOIN seller s ON h.h_seller_id = s.s_id JOIN house_tag ht ON h.h_id = ht.ht_house_id JOIN tag t ON ht.ht_tag_id = t.t_id WHERE t.t_name = #{tagName} AND h.h_checked = 1 ORDER BY h.h_id DESC
